content.question: <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> <math alttext="negative 3"><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></math> <math alttext="negative 2.5"><mo>-</mo><mn>2.5</mn></math> <math alttext="negative 2"><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn></math> <math alttext="negative 1.5"><mo>-</mo><mn>1.5</mn></math> <math alttext="negative 1"><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></math> <math alttext="negative 0.5"><mo>-</mo><mn>0.5</mn></math> <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math> <math alttext="0.5"><mn>0.5</mn></math> <math alttext="1"><mn>1</mn></math> <math alttext="1.5"><mn>1.5</mn></math> <math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math> <math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> <math alttext="negative 12"><mo>-</mo><mn>12</mn></math> <math alttext="negative 4.375"><mo>-</mo><mn>4.375</mn></math> <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math> <math alttext="1.875"><mn>1.875</mn></math> <math alttext="2"><mn>2</mn></math> <math alttext="1.125"><mn>1.125</mn></math> <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math> <math alttext="negative 0.625"><mo>-</mo><mn>0.625</mn></math> <math alttext="0"><mn>0</mn></math> <math alttext="2.625"><mn>2.625</mn></math> <math alttext="8"><mn>8</mn></math> The table provides values for a cubic polynomial function <math alttext="p"><mi>p</mi></math> at selected values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>. What are all intervals of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> for which <math alttext="p open parentheses x close parentheses greater or equal than 0"><mi>p</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>≥</mo><mn>0</mn></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="open square brackets negative 2 comma infinity close parentheses"><mpadded><mfenced open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="open square brackets negative 2 comma 0 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open square brackets 1 comma infinity close parentheses"><mpadded><mfenced open="["><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced></mpadded></math> only

<math alttext="open square brackets negative 2 comma 0 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open square brackets 1 comma 2 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> only

<math alttext="open square brackets negative 1.5 comma negative 0.5 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>1.5</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open square brackets 1.5 comma 2 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mn>1.5</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> only

content.answer: <math alttext="open square brackets negative 2 comma 0 close square brackets"><mfenced close="]" open="["><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> and <math alttext="open square brackets 1 comma infinity close parentheses"><mpadded><mfenced open="["><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>∞</mo></mrow></mfenced></mpadded></math> only

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
